front.title: Text-based Compression Using Cache and Blank Approach (TCCB)

abstract.t: This document defines an efficient, robust, and scalable scheme for the compression of text-based protocols. Such protocols (e.g. SIP, SDP) when sent uncompressed over limited bandwidth networks (such as Cellular or the upstream of Hybrid Fiber Coax (HFC)) causes inadvertent delays in call set up. TCCB addresses these problems and proposes a simple mechanism to reduce the size of the messages and hence the recurrent delay
